description: Russia flatly denies a Czech report alleging a Russian agent came to Prague to poison local mayors.
title: Police protecting Prague mayor after 'Russian murder plot'
title_page: Police protecting Prague mayor after 'Russian murder plot' - BBC News
maintext: He did say he had filed a report to the authorities after noticing he was being followed close to his home, and had seen the same person "multiple times", but he added that he could not confirm if the protection was related to this report.
